attributes.action: Allow construction workers the right to wear shorts at their own discretion
attributes.background: Some construction sites have a 'no shorts policy ' despite the working tasks carrying no risk to health / safety . Other sites have no such rules. Fully grown adults should have the right to chose to be cool when working in hot conditions

rejection.details:
At the moment, this is a decision for employers, acting within the relevant law, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take action, you could start a new petition asking clearly for a specific action.
